modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mtrsteaml: Various experimental addon functionalities made by Zbx1425 for the MTR mod, some of which might be contributed to the mod in the future.
train.mtrsteamloco.dk3.description:
The Beijing Subway DK3 stock manufactured by Changchun Car Company (now CRRC Changchun) was put into operation in 1971, mainly serving the first phase system and the later Line 1. Trains with the blue Line 2 paintwork are very rare in reality.

Model: CSSSC (http://www.csssc.com.cn), ported content redistributed under authorization
Animation, Sound, Programming: Zbx1425
train.mtrsteamloco.d51.description:
The D51 steam locomotive of the JNR (now privatized) was produced with a total amount of 1,115 units between 1935 and 1945, the largest number in any single class of locomotive in Japan.

Model, Animation, Sound: Midnight Express Ginga81 (ginga81) (http://midnightexpginga81.web.fc2.com), licensed under GPLv2
Smoke Effect, Programming: Zbx1425
gui.mtrsteamloco.eye_candy.tip_resource_: You can import objects via Resource Pack. Click here for details.
gui.mtrsteamloco.brush_edit_rail.brush_h: This sets the function of the brush. Right-click on others to apply in batch.
gui.mtrsteamloco.brush_edit_rail.vertica: Real-life values for reference: 4000 (Lateral R<800), 3000 (R>=800) (天野ほか，図説鉄道工学P44)

A higher setting results in a smoother but steeper slope.
Max radius possible for this rail: %sm
Max pitch at the current radius setting: %s‰
gui.mtrsteamloco.statistic_turnstile_vis: Welcome to %s! You are our visitor No.%d!
Welcome back to %s! (You are our visitor No.%d)
gui.mtrsteamloco.feedback_success: Your feedback has been received, and can be viewed at:
gui.mtrsteamloco.error.title: Error in NTE resource loading process
gui.mtrsteamloco.error.explain:
If you are a player, just click the Cancel button. If you are a resource pack author, you can check the error message.
It's most likely to be from an error in a resource pack, but it can also be caused by a bug in another mod utilizing NTE or NTE itself.
gui.mtrsteamloco.config.client.title: NTE Rendering Config
gui.mtrsteamloco.config.client.shaderact:
3D rail and rendering optimization are currently unavailable, 
due to their incompatibility with Optifine.
gui.mtrsteamloco.config.client.rail3d.de: Turn it off to make invisible nodes caused by WorldEdit copying connected nodes visible.
gui.mtrsteamloco.config.client.transluce: When enabled, precisely calculate how they lay on top of each other. Disabling this can increase performance
gui.mtrsteamloco.config.client.hideridin: Hide the Train on Which You Are Riding
gui.mtrsteamloco.config.client.preloadbb:
This optimizes the rendering efficiency for custom trains with BBMODEL, especially for detailed models.
However it increases RAM usage, and on some computers it was reported to make little or even negative contributions.
gui.mtrsteamloco.mtr_version_low: Please upgrade MTR: NTE %s requires MTR %s or above, while a lower version %s is installed.
